title: Quest Items
content: to resemble a realistic eye. Its tarnished brass fittings hum with a tinge of magic. Allows you to see invisible creatures within 9m. (Formerly -1 INT, +1 CHA) Tower-Shaped Key An elaborate key, plated with silver. Tower-Shaped Key opens the Keyholed Herald, revealing a secret area in the Reithwin Mason's Guild once unlucked. The Keyholed Herald can be found in Mason's Guild. Soft-Step Key An elaborate key, plated with silver. You can use Soft-Step Key to open a gate in order to find an Umbral G
